verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In need of grace.
In need of love.
In need of mercy raining down
From high above.
In need of strength.
In need of peace.
In need of things
That only You can give to me.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
In need of Christ, the perfect Lamb,
My refuge strong, the Great I AM.
This is my song, my humble plea;
I am Your child, I am in need.
